steps.text: You came home to the de-occupied territory. The weather is great, the sun is shining! You can't wait to visit the house for the first time! And here you are at the fence:
After inspecting the yard in the distance, you saw a yellow teddy bear toy. You:
WARNING! You are lucky! You didn't come across explosives. And the house is intact! But what lies there? Purse in the middle of the kitchen? Hmmm :/
